listitem.para: Contains pointers to named resources with external linkage, so that their respective contents can be defined elsewhere. Also contains definitions of functions that provide access to these specifically-named resources, which necessitates external linkage.

Contains pointers to named resources with external linkage, so that their respective contents can be defined elsewhere. Also contains definitions of functions that provide access to these specifically-named resources, which necessitates external linkage.
Contains a default definition of 'Windows_TemporaryKey_pfx_array' (see 'copyright' section).
Contains a default definition of 'Windows_TemporaryKey_pfx_array' (see 'copyright' section).
